channel.title: Azure AD on Microsoft 365 Platform Community Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Azure AD on Microsoft 365 Platform Community Blog

item.title: PnP PowerShell v1.10
item.description: PnP PowerShell is a cross-platform PowerShell Module providing over 600 cmdlets that work with Microsoft 365 environments and more specifically SharePoint Online, Microsoft Teams, Microsoft Planner and Power Automate.

item.title: CLI for Microsoft 365 v4.4
item.description: CLI for Microsoft 365 is a cross-platform CLI that allows you to manage various configuration settings of Microsoft 365 and SharePoint Framework projects no matter which operating system or shell you use

item.title: Looking at things in profile
item.description: User Profiles are an increasingly important part of a modern organisation While they have always been important as a (often underused) tool for finding staff and searching for people with certain skills, the changes in work practice wrought by the COVID-19 pandemic now mean that staff spend less time together physically, so have less opportunity to know their colleagues and create the social and personal links that team-building and socialisation rely on.

item.title: Change your own profile picture as a Guest in Microsoft Teams
item.description: I love Microsoft Teams and I also love controlling my online appearance, but sadly both aren’t big friends when you are a Guest in another tenant.
